mapper.select: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, ( IF (COLUMN_KEY = 'PRI', 1, 0)) as COLUMN_KEY, COLUMN_COMMENT FROM information_schema.COLUMNS where table_name = #{tableName} and table_schema = #{schema}

SELECT utc.COLUMN_NAME, utc.DATA_TYPE, ucc.COMMENTS COLUMN_COMMENT, nvl2( ( SELECT CONSTRAINT_TYPE FROM USER_CONS_COLUMNS A, USER_CONSTRAINTS B WHERE A.CONSTRAINT_NAME = B.CONSTRAINT_NAME AND B.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' AND A.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} AND A.COLUMN_NAME = ucc.COLUMN_NAME ), 1, 0 ) AS COLUMN_KEY FROM user_tab_columns utc LEFT JOIN user_col_comments ucc ON utc.COLUMN_NAME = ucc.COLUMN_NAME WHERE utc.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} AND ucc.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}
SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM USER_CONS_COLUMNS A, USER_CONSTRAINTS B WHERE A.CONSTRAINT_NAME = B.CONSTRAINT_NAME AND B.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' AND A.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}
